TEXT.S: = Pukpuk = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Ciansyang ka alang Pukpuk. 2,688 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 6,978 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 18% niqan 1,245 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 82% niqan 5,733 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 15%, Truku 1%, Bunun 0.5%, Tayal 0.5%.
